00005 MMLmsubsup::MMLmsubsup(MMLDocument *o)
00006         : MMLElement(MML::MSUBSUP, o) {
00007 
00008         if (!defset[id]) {
00009                 defset[id] = true;
00010                 const MMLAttribute **da = defatt[id];
00011                 using namespace MML;
00012                 MML::createAttribute(MML::SUBSCRIPTSHIFT, "0.7ex", id, da);
00013                 MML::createAttribute(MML::SUPERSCRIPTSHIFT, "1ex", id, da);
00014         }

00025 void
00026 MMLmsubsup::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00027         MMLNode *base = first;
00028         MMLNode *sub = getNext(first);
00029         MMLNode *sup = last;
00030         // read metrics for current font
00031         base->layout(a);
00032         a->setAttribute(MML::DISPLAYSTYLE, false);
00033         int sl = a->scriptlevel()+1;
00034         a->setAttribute(MML::SCRIPTLEVEL, sl);
00035         sub->layout(a);
00036         sup->layout(a);
00037 
00038         float subshift = a->superscriptshift().get(a);
00039         if (subshift == 0) {
00040                 subshift = base->getDescent()-sub->getDescent();
00041         }
00042         sub->setX(base->getWidth());
00043         sub->setY(subshift);
00044         float supshift = a->superscriptshift().get(a);
00045         if (supshift == 0) {
00046                 supshift = base->getAscent()-sup->getAscent();
00047         }
00048         sup->setX(base->getWidth());
00049         sup->setY(-supshift);
00050 
00051         float subwidth = sub->getWidth();
00052         float supwidth = sup->getWidth();
00053         gui->width = base->getWidth() + (subwidth>supwidth) ? subwidth : supwidth;
00054         gui->ascent = base->getAscent();
00055         gui->descent = base->getDescent();
00056 }
00057 void
00058 MMLmsubsup::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00059         MMLNode *base = first;
00060         MMLNode *sub = getNext(first);
00061         MMLNode *sup = last;
00062         base->paint(a);
00063         a->setAttribute(MML::DISPLAYSTYLE, false);
00064         int sl = a->scriptlevel()+1;
00065         a->setAttribute(MML::SCRIPTLEVEL, sl);
00066         sub->paint(a);
00067         sup->paint(a);
00068 }
